mapper.sql: id, areaCode, projectId, targetId, volunteerId, volName, idCardNo, telephone, volType, remark, status, createUserId, createUserName, createDate,aidTargetType
mapper.insert: insert into act_family_volunteer (id, areaCode, projectId, targetId, volunteerId, volName, idCardNo, telephone, volType, remark, status, createUserId, createUserName, createDate,aidTargetType) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{targetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{volunteerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{volName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{volType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{aidTargetType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update act_family_volunteer set volunteerId = null , aidTargetType='6' where id in
#{ids}
mapper.sql: t.id, t.areaCode, t.projectId, t.targetId, t.volunteerId, t.volName, t.idCardNo, t.telephone, t.volType, t.remark, t.status, t.createUserId, t.createUserName, t.createDate,t.aidTargetType,p.name,p.idCard,p.userType,p.mobile
mapper.select: select t.id, t.areaCode, t.projectId, t.targetId, t.volunteerId,t.aidTargetType,p.name,p.idCard,p.mobile,p.userType FROM act_family_volunteer t left join base_volunteer p on t.volunteerId = p.id where t.projectId = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.targetId = #{targetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql: p.id, p.projectCode, p.projectName, p.projectLevel, p.category, p.areaCode, p.startTime, p.endTime, p.summary, p.projectState, p.actTimes, p.overallScore, p.partakeDuration, p.anomalyTimes,p.fmUrl, p.nineteenJiFen, p.jiFen, p.status,p.pid ,zp.name areaName
mapper.select: select DISTINCT p.id pid,p.category, t.personId targetId, pe.personName targetName,t.areaCode from act_project p left join act_family_target t on t.projectId =p.id left join act_family_volunteer v on v.targetId=t.id left join act_person pe on pe.id=t.personId where p.projectState='2' and p.id=#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and v.volunteerId = #{volunteerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and p.category='1'

select DISTINCT p.id pid,p.category, t.targetId targetId, s.schoolName targetName, t.areaCode from act_project p left join act_project_target t on t.projectId =p.id LEFT JOIN act_project_volunteer v on t.id=v.targetId left join act_school s on s.id=t.targetId where p.projectState='2' and p.id=#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and v.volunteerId =#{volunteerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and p.category=#{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
